Screenwriter: Richard Brooks, Julius J. Epstein, Philip G. Epstein, F. Scott Fitzgerald
Distributor: Take 2 Video, MGM/UA Home Entertainment Inc., Hollywood Classics, Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer, Madacy Entertainment Group Inc. [us], Navarre Entertainment
Synopsis: Reporter Charles Wills (Van Johnson), in Paris to cover the end of World War II, falls for the beautiful Helen Ellswirth (Elizabeth Taylor) following a brief flirtation with her sister, Marion (Donna Reed). After he and Helen marry, Charles pursues his novelistic ambition while supporting his new bride with a deadening job at a newspaper wire service. But when an old investment suddenly makes the family wealthy, their marriage begins to unravel -- until a sudden tragedy changes everything.
Title: The Last Time I Saw Paris
